author: Microsoft
description:
“This is the biggest management revolution in history,” says Dan Diasio, EY’s Global Consulting AI Leader. The corporate ladder? Completely kicked over. Starting next year, new hires could be managers on day one—leading an agentic AI workforce that’s powerful, sometimes clumsy, and demands a new skill set: technological management. Discover what this shift means for leadership in the age of AI.

#microsoft #podcast #techpodcast #mollywood #ai #agenticai

title: Why new hires will be managers on day one

author: Microsoft
description:
EY's Global Consulting AI Leader Dan Diasio joins host Molly Wood to discuss how agentic AI is shaping the future of work and how companies can reinvent themselves as AI-first Frontier Firms. Learn how AI is disrupting the consulting industry, why investing in upskilling your employees is now mandatory, and why the right combination of mindset, skill set, and tool set matters more than ever. Listen in to discover practical strategies for leaders to drive transformation and compete with AI-native disruptors. 

00:00 – What an agentic workforce looks like
00:31 – Molly Wood introduces EY Global leader Dan Diasio
01:15 – How a 100‑year firm reimagines itself in the age of AI
02:25 – Does AI threaten the consulting business?
03:10 – EY’s transformation to a Frontier firm
04:37 – Hands‑on AI masterclass for CEOs and management
06:19 – “AI raises the floor, not the ceiling”
07:40 – Why the real opportunity is growth, not productivity
09:21 – Frontier Firm playbook: the three things you need
title: Is Agentic AI upending the corporate ladder? EY's Global Consulting AI Leader shares what’s coming
